author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Arkheron in this latest trailer for the upcoming fast-paced, dynamic PvP game, where 15 teams of three battle to ascend a mysterious Tower built from fragments of their life before. In Arkheron, items are the heroes - each one imbued with powerful abilities that shape how you fight, adapt, and outplay other teams. Build your strategy and playstyle on the fly by looting and combining items in real time, creating unique build-outs throughout every match. Arkheron will be available on Steam, Xbox, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

Sign-ups for an upcoming playtest weekend are available now on Steam, with queues for the main game mode open from 11 a.m. to 11 p.m. PDT each day on Friday, September 19 - Sunday, September 21.
title: Arkheron - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for PERFECT BLUE Remastered coming to theatres in North America October 3!

Rising pop star Mima quits singing to pursue a career as an actress, but her fans aren’t ready to see her go...
Encouraged by her managers, Mima takes up a role on a popular detective show, when her handlers and collaborators begin turning up murdered. Harboring feelings of guilt and haunted by visions of her former self, Mima’s reality and fantasy meld into a frenzied paranoia. As her stalker closes in, in person and online, the threat he poses is more real than even Mima knows.

#IGN #Anime
title: PERFECT BLUE Remastered - Official 4K Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Another rumor about the Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake has been making the rounds on the Internet. According to the latest, Ubisoft will cut all the present-day Abstergo portions of the game, and instead will add in new content featuring Edward Kenway and Marie Read. Fans are upset that Ubisoft might cut any of the original content, but this follows recent trends in the franchise, which focuses heavily on the historical eras of the games. The recent Assassin's Creed Shadows, for example, doesn't feature any present-day gameplay sections at all. In other news, developers for Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 are backtracking some of their DLC plans. Two of the playable vampire factions will originally going to be behind a paywall, but after fan backlash, they will be playable from the start. And finally, RGG Studio may have accidentally leaked that they're working on Yakuza Kiwami 3.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Black Flag Remake May Cut Present-Day Content And Fans Aren’t Happy - IGN Daily Fix

description: Don't miss the Overview Trailer for Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, a first-person vampire action RPG developed by The Chinese Room. Players will awaken from an eternal slumber into the modern day to make a name for themselves and take back the night in vampiric fashion. Get an overview of the game, including the six playable clans, dialogue choices, and additional content becoming available to the game as well. Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

author: IGN
description: THE HOUSEMAID is a wildly entertaining thriller starring Sydney Sweeney and Amanda Seyfried, based on the best-selling book. From director Paul Feig, the film plunges audiences into a twisted world where perfection is an illusion, and nothing is as it seems. Trying to escape her past, Millie (Sweeney) accepts a job as a live-in housemaid for the wealthy Nina (Seyfried) and Andrew Winchester (Brandon Sklenar). But what begins as a dream job quickly unravels into something far more dangerous — a sexy, seductive game of secrets, scandal, and power. Behind the Winchesters’ closed doors lies a world of shocking twists that will leave you guessing until the very end.
title: The Housemaid - Official Trailer (2025) Sydney Sweeney, Amanda Seyfried

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Jimmy Neutron Reveal Trailer for Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, an action RPG developed by Petit Fabrik and Fair Play Labs. Players will get a look at Jimmy Neutron in action with a concoction of science and chaos at his disposal. Make use of his Laser Tag, Laser Sword, and Good Dog abilities to bring a mix of weapons and Goddard into the fray. Play as Jimmy Neutron in Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, launching on September 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny - Official Jimmy Neutron Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
One of the strongest builds in Borderlands 4 right now is Vex utilizing her  Blood Letter (Let Her Bleed) skill. This setup has the potential to scale infinitely, stacking damage over and over until enemies and even bosses melt in seconds. With the right gear and specializations, it’s one of the fastest and deadliest builds in the game. This guide will break down how the build works, what gear you need, and the exact skill setup that makes it so powerful.

Timecodes
Intro/Build Overview - 00:00
Bloodletter Skill - 01:17
Skill Tree Build - 02:30
Equipment - 05:20
Specializations - 10:58
Rotation/How to Play This Build - 11:48

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Strongest Vex Build in Borderlands 4 – Blood Letter Infinite Damage Guide

author: IGN
description:
Warborne Above Ashes is a free-to-fight PvP MMO that delivers large-scale warfare, with battles unfolding in real-time with up-to 200 players. The game supports online multiplayer gaming modes.

Become a Driftmaster to ride behemoths and rally your warbands. Dive into massive, ever-shifting battlefields with thousands of players online and experience truly rule-free warfare.

Boundless, Relentless, Fearless!

On September 19, Warborne Above Ashes officially launches worldwide. Pre-download is available now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3142050/_/. For more latest updates, please visit the official site:  https://warborne.qoolandgames.com and join our official Discord server:  discord.gg/EUXk2zVFnV now!

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Good Boy trailer for this upcoming horror thriller film starring Indy the Dog, Shane Jensen, Arielle Friedman, and Larry Fessenden.

Our canine hero, Indy, finds himself on a new adventure with his human owner—and best friend—Todd, leaving city life for a long-vacant family home in the country. From the start, two things are abundantly clear: Indy is wary of the creepy old house, and his affection for Todd is unwavering. After moving in, Indy is immediately vexed by empty corners, tracks an invisible presence only he can see, perceives phantasmagoric warnings from a long-dead dog, and is haunted by visions of the previous occupant’s grim death. When Todd begins succumbing to the dark forces swirling around the house, Indy must battle a malevolence intent on dragging his beloved Todd into the afterlife.

Good Boy is produced by Ben Leonberg and Kari Fischer. It is written by Alex Cannon and Ben Leonberg.

Good Boy, directed by Ben Leonberg, opens in theaters on Octobe
title: Good Boy - Official Final Trailer (2025) Shane Jensen, Arielle Friedman, Larry Fessenden

Get a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Borderlands 4, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC, with a release on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3.

author: IGN
description:
One Battle After Another, the new film by director Paul Thomas Anderson (PTA), and starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Teyana Taylor, Sean Penn, Chase Infiniti, Benicio Del Toro, and Regina Hall comes out on September 26, 2025. This is IGN’s One Battle After Another Review by Michael Calabro.

In this One Battle After Another Movie Review, we’ll briefly cover some of the One Battle After Another best scenes, including Leonardo DiCaprio best scenes. The review also contextualizes the history of Paul Thomas Anderson and Leonardo DiCaprio movies and talks about their history of trying to work together, including how Leo passed on Boogie Nights to star in Titanic. 

Our review will also talk about PTA’s other movies like Boogie Nights, Magnolia, There Will Be Blood, and Inherent Vice, and how his experiences making those movies influenced One Battle After Another best scenes.

This video may not be a One Battle After Another movie explained type video, but the review does discuss Thomas Pynchon’s
title: One Battle After Another Review

description:
Check out the Dual Katana Gameplay Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, an upcoming action-adventure sequel to the hit Ghost of Tsushima developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Players can slice and dice their adversaries with the power of two katanas at the ready for brutal close-quarters engagements. Get a look at the intense Dual Katana gameplay for Ghost of Yotei, launching on October 3 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#GhostOfYotei #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Dual Katana Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A few years after surviving the last demon apocalypse, Brodie is washed-up, broke, and stuck in small-town purgatory. But when he learns that NoizeQuest, a battle-of-the-bands competition, is coming to his town, he sees a shot at redemption - and maybe even a second chance with Medina. One problem: his drummer is missing an arm, and the rest of his band is, well... dead. Luckily, Brodie still has the pages of The Black Hymn, so raising his bandmates from the great beyond is just a riff away. But with every chord comes blood, guts, and the kind of apocalyptic chaos only Deathgasm can unleash.

Reprising their iconic roles from the 2015 original are Milo Cawthorne as Brodie and Kimberley Crossman as Medina, alongside James Joshua Blake, Sam Berkley, and Daniel Cresswell. The sequel also introduces us to new characters played by Kieran Charnock, Harrison Keefe, and Maggie Nicole Robertson. Plus, metal musician Matthew Kiichi Heafy, of Grammy-nominated metal band Trivium, composed the fil
title: Deathgasm II: Goremaggedon - Exclusive Red Band Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Cosmic Ghost Rider and Black Panther are coming to Marvel Cosmic Invasion. Watch the latest Marvel Cosmic Invasion for this upcoming arcade-style tag-team beat ‘em up game to see Cosmic Ghost Rider and Black Panther gameplay and these playable characters in action. Marvel Cosmic Invasion will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox.

In Marvel Cosmic Invasion, the immortal Super Villain Annihilus has launched an unprecedented attack across the galaxy, threatening all life as we know it. Super Heroes, both Earth-born and cosmic, must now join forces in a star-spanning adventure against the deadly Annihilation Wave. Brawl through the streets of New York City all the way to the depths of the Negative Zone to foil Annihilus’ vow to spread death across the cosmos in classically inspired side-scrolling combat.

#MarvelCosmicInvasion #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Official Cosmic Ghost Rider & Black Panther Character Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Metroidvania genre is full of memorable classics that can hang with the best of the original franchises that give the genre its name. There are plenty of 2D platformer games to choose from, with Ori and the Will of the Wisps, Animal Well, Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, plus Hollow Knight and more! So, is Hollow Knight: Silksong the best Metroidvania of 2025? Here are our favourites!

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Vicious trailer for this upcoming movie starring Dakota Fanning, Kathryn Hunter, Mary McCormack, Rachel Blanchard, Devyn Nekoda, Klea Scott, and Emily Mitchell.

When Polly (Dakota Fanning) receives a mysterious Box from an unexpected late-night visitor, it comes with a simple instruction: place three things inside: something you need, something you hate, and something you love. What begins as a strange ritual quickly unravels into a waking nightmare. Trapped in a terrifying world where reality bends and memory betrays, Polly must navigate a series of impossible choices. As time slips away, she’s forced to confront the darkness not just around her, but within her—before it consumes everything and everyone she’s ever known.

Vicious is produced by Richard Suckle, p.g.a. and Bryan Bertino. Melinda Whitaker and Shane Boucher serve as executive producers. It is written and directed by Bryan Bertino.

Vicious is streaming on Paramount+ and available to buy on digital October
title: Vicious - Official Trailer (2025) Dakota Fanning, Kathryn Hunter, Mary McCormack

description:
Check out the first 42 minutes of No, I’m Not a Human, a paranoia-driven horror game set at the end of times. If you’re a fan of psychological horror, survival tension, or games that thrive on paranoia, this one is for you.

Stay inside. Lock your doors. Close the blinds. Only let humans in. Eliminate all Visitors.

#gaming  #noimnotahuman #horror #ign

Discover every object's unique properties and abilities and cleverly combine them to progress through Henry’s not-so-ordinary everyday life. From clever puzzles to hilarious interactions, Henry Halfhead delivers a one-of-a-kind experience full of charm, experimentation, and surprise.

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Anaconda, an action-adventure comedic horror film distributed by Columbia Pictures. Follow the story of an indie film being shot that unfolds into chaos and hilarity at every turn of the production. Anaconda is in theaters on December 25.

Doug and Griff have been best friends since they were kids, and have always dreamed of remaking their all-time favorite movie: the cinematic "classic" Anaconda. When a midlife crisis pushes them to finally go for it, they head deep into the Amazon to start filming. But things get real when an actual giant anaconda appears, turning their comically chaotic movie set into a deadly situation. The movie they’re dying to make? It might just get them killed......

Anaconda stars Jack Black, Paul Rudd, Steve Zahn, Thandiwe Newton, Daniela Melchior, Selton Mello, and more. The film is produced by Brad Fuller, Andrew Form, Kevin Etten, and Tom Gormican, while being written by Tom Gormican and Kevin Etten.

Anaconda is in th
title: Anaconda - Official Trailer (2025) Jack Black, Paul Rudd, Steve Zahn

author: IGN
description: Dying Light: The Beast drops you into the end of the world with nothing but your wits, a few weapons, and some slick parkour moves – and thats all that stands between you and being torn apart by an endless army of zombies. If you want to avoid ending up dead (or undead), we’ve got the expert advice to help you survive. Here are 8 things Dying Light: The Beast doesn’t tell you.
title: Dying Light: The Beast – 8 Things It Doesn’t Tell You

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight: Silksong reviewed by Tom Marks on PC, also available on PlayStation, Nintendo Switch 1 & 2, and Xbox.

Hollow Knight: Silksong has managed to live up to my high expectations, taking a game I absolutely adored and quite literally turning its dash into a full-on sprint. It’s bigger, more vibrant, and just as creative as the original sprawling epic, and it tweaks every system in largely smart ways. Some of its quests and an oddly structured finale do make small missteps, but Team Cherry has nailed the overall balance between satisfying 2D platforming challenges, enticing exploration of a beautiful and surprising world, and nail-biting combat with thrilling boss battles in a way few games do. It’s also unapologetically challenging in all of that, punishing you in a way that can occasionally sting but never feels unforgiving, giving you both huge obstacles to surmount and plenty of tools to figure out how to do so. It asks you to face down the unbeatable and overcome the thi
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Review
